description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using LightningJS. It creates animated circles for a loading indicator with transition effects and an interval to toggle the alpha transparency.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that shows a loading animation with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts an interval to toggle the alpha value of the circles, creating a fade-in/fade-out effect.
